name: ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y build-essential libicu-dev libmagic-dev cmake pkg-config libssl-dev && git config --global --add safe.directory ${containerWorkspaceFolder}
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'gem install bundler && bundle config set --local path "vendor/bundle" && if [ -f Gemfile ]; then if [ ! -f Gemfile.lock ]; then echo "No Gemfile.lock found, generating it..." && (bundle install || (echo "Bundle install failed, attempting to install known gems individually..." && gem install workato-connector-sdk charlock_holmes -v "~> 0.7.7" rubocop pry rspec && bundle lock --add-platform x86_64-linux || echo "Warning: Could not generate complete Gemfile.lock")); else echo "Gemfile.lock exists, running bundle install..." && bundle install; fi; else echo "No Gemfile found, skipping bundle operations"; fi && echo "Setup complete!"'
postAttachCommand: bash -c 'if [ -f Gemfile ] && [ ! -f Gemfile.lock ]; then echo "Warning: Gemfile.lock still missing, attempting to create..." && (bundle lock --add-platform x86_64-linux || echo "Could not create Gemfile.lock - please check your Gemfile for errors"); fi && ([ -f bin/dev ] && bin/dev || [ -f config.ru ] && bundle exec rails server -b 0.0.0.0 || true)'
